column2: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)

Penyata pilehanraya-pilehanraya umum parlimen (Dewan Ra'ayat) dan dewan-dewan negeri, tahun 1964 bagi negeri-negeri Tanah Melayu by Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2022), singapore-elections.com. Refer to 1964_Other_Sources_File for more information

There may be discrepancies for the age of candidates as there is no official data released for the attribute.There may be a presence for missing data points for age attribute for candidates. Berita Harian of 24th March 1964 have undercounted women candidate presence. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives
FIELD DESCRIPTION
Composite between Parliamentary Code and State Constituency Code
State Name
Parliamentary Code (follow sequencing of Penyata pilehanraya-pilehanraya umum parlimen (Dewan Ra'ayat) dan dewan-dewan negeri, tahun 1964 bagi negeri-negeri Tanah Melayu)
Parliamentary Name (follow sequencing of Penyata pilehanraya-pilehanraya umum parlimen (Dewan Ra'ayat) dan dewan-dewan negeri, tahun 1964 bagi negeri-negeri Tanah Melayu)
State Constituency Code (follow sequencing of Penyata pilehanraya-pilehanraya umum parlimen (Dewan Ra'ayat) dan dewan-dewan negeri, tahun 1964 bagi negeri-negeri Tanah Melayu)
State Constituency Code Name (follow sequencing of Penyata pilehanraya-pilehanraya umum parlimen (Dewan Ra'ayat) dan dewan-dewan negeri, tahun 1964 bagi negeri-negeri Tanah Melayu)
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Total Elector Count for the 1964 elections
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total number of ballot papers issued at the poll
Total number of ballot papers issued but not put in the ballot box and not returned (no information is available)
Total number of rejected ballot papers
Total number of votes by electors
